   contain the root `toctree` directive.

schengulator
============

Schengulator is a tool to calculate how many days an individual has been in Schengen countries out of a specified 180-day period.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   rules
   quickstart
   acknowledgements
   modules
